text: Sivaladapinae is a subfamily of adapiform primate that lived in Asia during the middle to late Miocene. ==References== ===Literature cited=== * Category:Prehistoric strepsirrhines Category:Miocene mammals of Asia Category:Fossil taxa described in 1979 Category:Miocene first appearances Category:Miocene extinctions Category:Mammal subfamilies
title: Sivaladapinae
